Unity fNIRS Embodiment

About

Researcher, engineer, and facilitator.

I build immersive systems that bridge psychedelic science with cutting-edge XR. My work spans Unity prototyping, biosignal-driven feedback, embodied interaction design, and protocol design for studying altered states.

I collaborate with labs, founders, and clinicians to translate cognitive science insights into experiential tools—designing experiments, architecting software, and facilitating sessions that honor safety, rigor, and awe.
